item.title: Government shutdown continues into second day Thursday
item.description: What you need to know as the government shutdown continues. into its second day.

item.title: Bending the Arc application period opens
Bending the Arc: Students experience history on spring beak
Woman charged in DUI crash while driving with three children
item.description: All four occupants had visible injuries and were bleeding, a probable cause affidavit said.

item.title: Programming alert: MLB Wild Card game moves ABC7 News to MySuncoast.com
item.description: you can still see today’s top news stories and the First Alert Forecast streaming on our website.

item.title: ‘Stuff the Bus’ returns Oct. 5 to feed Manatee County families
item.description: It’s a simple ask with a big impact.

item.title: Sarasota students named National Merit Scholarship semifinalists
item.description: The U.S. pool of semifinalists represent less than 1% of high school seniors.

item.title: Senior Friendship Centers offers free vaccines, Medicare help, and scam-prevention workshops in Sarasota
item.description: The nonprofit is offering free and low-cost services this fall, including flu and RSV vaccines, and more.

item.title: Florida appeals court rules ‘plain smell’ of marijuana no longer enough to establish probable cause
item.description: The smell of marijuana is no longer enough to establish probable cause for police to justify a search, a Florida appeals court ruled on Wednesday.

item.title: Orionid Meteor Shower brings fireballs and shooting stars to Sarasota skies
item.description: Expect streaks of light, the occasional fireball, and a chance to see the remnants of a legendary visitor.

item.title: Tropical disturbance being watched near Florida
item.description: A new area of concern located near the SE coast of Florida is starting to show up on some forecast models.

item.title: New shelter opens in Manatee County for women in crisis
item.description: Under One Roof Gateway South, on 57th Avenue East, opened Wednesday.

item.title: Man rescued after boat capsizes near Sunshine Skyway Bridge
item.description: No injuries were reported and recovery of the man’s boat was in progress.
